1.title: Hold On, Stand Strong
1.lyrics:
When the sky is heavy and the rain starts to fall
and the world feels like it is after us all
remember your not alone in this fight
we've got each other shining bright
Storms come and go, but hope will show
with every breath we'll grow
lift your head and see the dawn
Together we keep holding on

Hold on, stand Strong
We are in this Together
through rain and Storms
no matter the weather
Lift up your voice
sing out your song
We're unbreakable, forever along
hold on stand Strong,
and never forget
love is the light we won't regret
we are one big family come what may
holding hands to face each new day

Face the judgement
Push through the doubt
Hear the hope inside ya' shout
Every challenge makes us who we are
Finding strength in who we are
Storms come and go but hope will show
with every breath we'll grow
Lift your head and see the dawn
Together we keep holding on

And when the night feels cold and long
Remember we belong
In a world where hope is never gone
Where together we are strong
We are one big family come what may
Holding hands to face each new day
And when the night feels cold and long
Remember we belong
And when the night feels cold and long
Remember we belong
In a world where hope is never gone
hold on stand Strong

2.title: Six Plants on my Balcony
2.lyrics:
Six plants on my balcony legal and free
Green leaves in the sunlight that's the life for me

Six per adult twelve per house that's the rule
Growing frosty buds nature's finest jewel

Six plants on my balcony legal and free
Green leaves in the sunlight that's the life for me

Harvest and hang trim and jar then start again
Outdoor season on the coast just around the bend

Thirty-gallon smart pots bathed in the sun
Not long 'til flower time as vegging is almost done

Six plants on my balcony legal and free
Green leaves in the sunlight that's the life for me

3.title: Spit On The Cat
3.lyrics:
Spit on the cat, spit on the cat, spit on the caaat,

Feel the winter's bite, hell's night in sight, ready for the fight.
Bass thumps, head bangs, chaos in the air,
Scream out the rage, life's a fucking snare.

Spit on the cat, darkness rising slow,
Porch ice, cat cries, in the freezing snow.
No holding back, just let it all out,
End times roar, hear the devil's shout.

Spit on the cat, world's gone mad,
Demons in the veins, all the power you had.
Throaty growl, heavy beats, break the silence,
Life's a beast, all you know is violence.

Spit on the cat, in the devil's grip,
Black clothes, long hair, whiskey on the lip.
Smoke fills the air, chaos reigns supreme,
Satan laughs loud, it's the end-time dream.

4.title: Suppertime Pizza
4.lyrics:
Cookin' pizza
In the kitchen
It's a cheap supper
I think it could be love

Now I can't think of anything better
It takes two minutes to make
It's hot and steamy on a cold winter's day
Baby
Gimme a break

'Cause it's cold outside
And you know the world is burnin'
So I'm just gonna make a little pizza pie
Now you know I'm never hungry
'cause I eat every night
And I just don't have the time
'cause it's pizza

And I can't think of anything better
It takes two minutes to make
It's hot and steamy on a cold winter's day
Baby
Gimme a break

So cookin' pizza
In the kitchen
It's a cheap supper
I think it could be love

So it's cold outside
And you know the world is burnin'
So I'm just gonna make a little pizza pie
Now you know I'm never hungry
'cause I eat every night
And I just don't have the time
'cause it's pizza

5.title: Sweater Dog
5.lyrics:
In the morning light, you're curled up tight,
Little paws wrapped in knit, a cozy sight.
Wool and warmth in the quiet air,
You're dreaming dreams without a care.

Oh, sweater dog, you own this bed,
Snug as a bug with your sleepy head.
Every heartbeat, every sigh,
Wrapped up warm as the day goes by.

Tail's a wag in the soft embrace,
You find your peace in this quiet place.
From yawn to stretch, you claim the day,
In your sweater, you chase the gray away.

Oh, sweater dog, you own this bed,
Snug as a bug with your sleepy head.
Every heartbeat, every sigh,
Wrapped up warm as the day goes by.

Sunlight dances on your fur,
Gentle rhythm, no need to stir.
With every breath you softly take,
This cozy love, no one can break.

Oh, sweater dog, you own this bed,
Snug as a bug with your sleepy head.
Every heartbeat, every sigh,
Wrapped up warm as the day goes by.

Yeah, sweater dog, just close your eyes,
In your knit kingdom, where comfort lies.
I'll be right here, through every dream,
Together tangled in this perfect scene.

7.title: Cut Yourself Out
7.lyrics:
Inside the screech of neural skies,
Where shadows splice and daylight lies,
A blade of thoughts that never bleed,
Carve hollow caves beneath my need.

I slice the strings that bind my face,
Unfurl the veins, rearranged space,
Metal moons hum a fevered cry,
Cut yourself out, let spirit fly.

Behind the flesh, the cortex screams,
A carnival of shattered dreams.
Neon tendrils twist and shout,
Cut yourself out from the inside out.

Pulsing wires in spiraled throes,
Eruptions where the nightmare grows,
Surreal flesh, a phantom's doubt,
Heave your soul, cut yourself out.

Hack the marrow, breach the skin,
Freedom's fire rages within,
A cosmic gut-rip, wild and proud,
Cut yourself out from the inside out.

8.title: Apocoplypse Rising
8.lyrics:
Dust swirls in the marketplace, a bitter wind's begun,
Smoke climbs the skyline, twisted iron under sun,
Four riders crack the sky wide open, thunder in their stride,
Shadows cast on breaking glass, no place left to hide.

The time is now, can't deny the bleeding light,
Apocopylse rising, tearing through the night.
No more waiting on the sidelines to see the world divide,
Stand your ground, hold your breath, let the chaos be your guide.

Neon prophets preaching data streams and falling stars,
Signs and wonders flashing fast on broken digital bars,
Old orders crumble in the ruins of their lies,
New masters dancing in the ash, behind cold, watchful eyes.

The time is now, the chains will crack and fall,
Apocopylse rising, answering the call.
From shattered streets to the fire-lit skies,
We rise, we fight, before the last dawn dies.

Every tower made of greed, every law a gilded cage,
Unraveled truths thread the fabric of the age,
From burnt-out halls of justice to silent temple grounds,
Revolution's symphony plays a ruthless, roaring sound.

The time is now, the hourglass runs low,
Apocopylse rising, feel the rising flow.
Stand tall on ruins, in the face of the flood,
Faith in final freedom, in steel, in blood.

9.title: Trapped
9.lyrics:
Beneath the crust where daylight dies, I'm clawing shadows blind,
A tomb of stone, cold breath, and whispered curses left behind.
The earth itself a prison, walls closing like a fist,
Each heartbeat drums a warning, in this hellish, iron mist.

Trapped inside this hollow grave of coal-black, churning dread,
The bones of hope lie scattered where the living fear to tread.
Silence screams in caverns where the lost forever lie,
No dawn to break the darkness, no stars to mark the sky.

But listen close, the fire burns beneath the ash and gloom,
A spark that shreds the silence, a light that bursts the tomb.
Though shadows press like chains, my spirit won't expire,
For every breath I take fuels my fierce, unyielding fire.

Trapped beneath the shattered earth, where angels dare not roam,
I forge my will from sorrow, claim the darkened depth as home.
No cage, no crypt, can hold the rage that fans my flame,
In this abyss I'm rising—hell itself knows my name.

In the endless night of choking dread, I'll fight to stand and fight,
Breaking through the marrow, turning terror into light.
Though trapped within this grave of fear, my soul is not confined,
For even in the darkest cell, the fiercest hearts define.

10.title: Corrupted Controller
10.lyrics:
I've been counting pennies in a cage built on lies
Held down by whispers in the shadow of their eyes
Took the weight of their promises, thin and spoiled
Every word dripping venom, every promise soiled

But the hourglass is breaking, sand slipping through the cracks
No more silent suffering, no chains holding back
The puppeteers, they stumble in the web they wove
Their corrupted fingers can no longer hold the globe

No more control, no more lies to feed the fire
We're breaking the walls, tearing down the empire
Took too long to wake, but now the blind can see
No more corruption, we're finally free

Their thrones built on silence, their crowns made of greed
Burned the pages they wrote, tore up every seed
We stood in their shadows, swallowed all their pain
But the dawn's breaking fierce, washing clean the stain

Voices loud and rising, a storm you can't deny
Shattered lies and broken chains beneath the iron sky
We're the fire in the frost, the thunder in the night
Taking back what's ours with every fist held tight

No more control, no more lies to feed the fire
We're breaking the walls, tearing down the empire
Took too long to wake, but now the blind can see
No more corruption, we're finally free

No more control, no more lies to feed the fire
We're breaking the walls, tearing down the empire
Took too long to wake, but now the blind can see
No more corruption, no more corruption, we're finally free

11.title: I Am So Evil
11.lyrics:
I walk the shadows, feet cold on cracked stone
You say you've sinned, but baby, I own the throne
You tossed a coin, cheated fate with a crooked grin
But the darkness I cradle's deeper than your skin

You think you've spilled blood, broke a heart or two
Played your cards wrong, so what? I've danced with the blue
Of the devil himself when the night's swallowed hope
Carved my name on the devil's slippery slope

I am so evil, the fire that won't die
Burning through angels, watching them cry
I am so evil, the storm in your head
Clawing the silence, raising the dead

Choices are chains, but I forged mine in flame
Cowed by the light, but I won't play the tame
Struggling, clawing, hoping for dawn's gentle grace
But the beast under skin holds a ravenous pace

You confess your darkness like it's just a bruise
I wear my wickedness like a brand, no excuse
Redemption's a dream I chase but don't own
Because evil's a seed I have fiercely sown

I am so evil, the fire that won't die
Burning through angels, watching them cry
I am so evil, the storm in your head
Clawing the silence, raising the dead

The battle inside, it rages, it reels
A war of the soul where nothing's ideal
Yet here I stand, claws sharp, heart black as coal
Evil's my kingdom — and I'm in control.

12.title: Watcher of the Buds
12.lyrics:
In a haze where the green leaves sigh,
There's a watcher with many eyes,
From the dawn to the twilight's crawl,
He's seen the rise and every fall.

Whispers float through the ancient pines,
Stories woven in the twisted vines,
He moves between the smoke and sky,
A guardian none can deny.

Watcher of the buds, through time, through space,
Every seed in every place,
Silent witness, never speaks,
Guarding secrets that no one keeps.

From the deserts cold to the ocean's roar,
He's lingered long on the hidden floor,
Seen the prophets and rebels dance,
In the shadows of their trance.

Shifting winds carry the scent anew,
Of forbidden gardens and morning dew,
He watches still with a knowing grin,
Infinite watcher, where to begin?

Watcher of the buds, through time, through space,
Every seed in every place,
Silent witness, never speaks,
Guarding secrets that no one keeps.

A spiral star that bends the night,
He casts his gaze in fading light,
And every leaf beneath his gaze
Becomes a myth from ancient days.

Watcher of the buds, his tale untold,
In every stem, in every fold,
Through the smoke and through the flame,
He remains, he stays the same.

Watcher of the buds, through time, through space,
Every seed in every place,
Silent witness, never speaks,
Guarding secrets that no one keeps.

13.title: Weed Thief
13.lyrics:
In the haze of breaking dawn, the garden stood so fair
Each leaf a precious promise grown with patient care
I laid them out to cure beneath the sky so blue
But shadows crept to touch the green, my trust it never knew

Weed thief, oh weed thief, why do you haunt my luck?
Snatching treasures from the night while all my fences are struck
You leave me with the ash and bones of dreams I tried to keep
In the silence of the morning, you stole more than buds from me

The summer whispered secrets, the sun stained every leaf
Hands that did no labor came to take the fruits beneath
I saw the empty branches where the harvest used to shine
And in that hollow feeling, I cursed the hands that weren't mine

Weed thief, oh weed thief, why do you haunt my luck?
Snatching treasures from the night while all my fences are struck
You leave me with the ash and bones of dreams I tried to keep
In the silence of the morning, you stole more than buds from me

So now I walk the empty rows where green once dared to grow
With memories like smoke rings fading in the cold wind's blow
The taste of all my labor, turned bitter by the night
A ghost that steals the harvest, a thief that hides from light

Weed thief, oh weed thief, why do you haunt my luck?
Snatching treasures from the night while all my fences are struck
You leave me with the ash and bones of dreams I tried to keep
In the silence of the morning, you stole more than buds from me
